author: andyc
msg: Changes based on review of design document including multiple name
changes and changes in interfaces and classes.

author: andyc
msg: Spelling mistakes in Grammar definition. I'll re-generate the
stubs and HTML design document next time that there are major
changes.

author: andyc
msg: Removed "contentSpec" from XMLElementDecl.

author: ericye
msg: fix a bug in method ContentSpecTree().

author: andyc
msg: Update to design. Here's a list of some of those changes:
1) Added more methods to iterate over structures in the
Grammar. Also, removed XMLContentSpec since that is
an implementation detail that shouldn't carry over
to the generic Grammar model.
2) Merged the SymbolHasher interface into the SymbolTable
class. This simplifies the design and makes a big
difference in performance since we don't have to call
an interface method which is always slower than calling
a class method.
There was some thought to change the content model validator
but that was reconsidered as being not necessary and too
much of a hit to performance.
